EmailTemplate.name: SGT-PA030_September18-19_2012.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: REGISTRATION CONFIRMATION: Billing Software Group Training in Indiana, PA on September 18-19, 2012
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
STAY CONNECTED <http://www.facebook.com/pages/Tritech-Software-Systems/89416081839> <http://twitter.com/tritechsoftware> <http://www.linkedin.com/companies/tritech-software-systems> <http://www.youtube.com/user/TriTechSoftware> Registeration Confirmation Thank you for registering for Billing Software Group Training in Indiana, PA on September 18-19, 2012. Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Billing Customer}},
This is your confirmation email. A reminder will be sent later as the date gets closer.
If you selected credit card payment, a TriTech representative will contact you for your payment information.
If you have questions or if there is anything we can help with to make this a better experience for you, please contact us at:
Kim Walk, AmbCoach kwalk@ambcoach.com | 888-463-3488
Tyler Harman, TriTech Software Systems tyler.harman@tritech.com | 800-537-3927 ext 6290
DATE: September 18-19, 2012 (2 full days of training)
HOSTS: AmbCoach, Inc. (Indiana, PA) Classroom Style (you are welcome to bring a laptop to follow along if you'd like)
TRAINING LOCATION: <https://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&client=firefox-a&q=501+North+Wenatchee+Ave.+Wenatchee+WA+98801&ie=UTF-8&hq=&hnear=0x549bcc974f3cbfad:0x7bc5d0509cada363,501+N+Wenatchee+Ave,+Wenatchee,+WA+98801&gl=us&ei=wcnQT5KWF-Hb0QHvqOTCDQ&oi=geocode_result&ved=0CAoQ8gEwAA>Rustic Lodge, 2199 Oakland Avenue, Indiana, PA 15701 <http://maps.google.com/maps?oe=utf-8&rls=org.mozilla:en-US:official&client=firefox-a&um=1&ie=UTF-8&q=Rustic+Lodge,+2199+Oakland+Avenue,+Indiana,+PA+15701&fb=1&gl=us&hq=Rustic+Lodge,+2199+Oakland+Avenue,+Indiana,+PA+15701&cid=0,0,14345032003045000306&sa=X&ei=T5D8T7L6O4fxqQHywfWLCQ&ved=0CIABEPwSMAA&oi=local_group&ct=image>
SAMPLE AGENDA: Click here to download <http://www.tritechems.com/documents/_UG/Sample_2-day_Group_Training_agenda.pdf>
RECOMMENDED HOTEL: Holiday Inn Indiana 1395 Wayne Ave., Indiana, PA 15701 Website: http://www.holidayinn.com/hotels/us/en/indiana/idipa/hoteldetail <http://www.holidayinn.com/hotels/us/en/indiana/idipa/hoteldetail> Telephone: 724-463-3561 Rate: $99.00 (Ask for the “TriTech” room block)
**Tritech retains the right to cancel this event 30 days prior if registrations are below the minimum required.**
